lead_paragraph: George Osborne warned at the start of the year that the economy faced a “cocktail of risks” because of spillover from a slowdown in China and a slump in commodity prices.

headline.main: Data Out of Britain Adds to Worries of Broader Slump

snippet: George Osborne warned at the start of the year that the economy faced a “cocktail of risks” because of spillover from a slowdown in China and a slump in commodity prices.
